import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { useState } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' export default function EditArticleForm() { let params = useParams() const [inputs, setInputs] = useState({}) useEffect(() => { const articleId = params.articleId axios.get(`/api/articles/${articleId}`) .then((initialPost) => initialPost.data) .then(data => setInputs(data)) }, []) return (
















) }
